metadata.description: Personal Claude Code commands and utilities. Copy formatting, tweet posting, and more.

plugins.name: copy
plugins.description: Format and copy Claude output to clipboard for Slack, Email, Google Chat, Google Docs, or Jira.

plugins.name: setup-pulse
plugins.description: Install claude-pulse statusline for real-time token usage monitoring.

plugins.name: tweet
plugins.description: Post tweets to X (Twitter) from Claude Code. Drafts, previews, posts with approval. Supports threads and replies.
